remarks: Comparable spans of nonzero singletons are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lspsncmp.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsncmp.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsncmp.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsncmp.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspsncmp.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lspsncmp.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspsncmp $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` { X } ) C_ ( N ` { Y } ) <-> ( N ` { X } ) = ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) $.
